submission.message:
Thank you for submitting this form. We will contact you within 7 working days to confirm the application and aim to complete the addressing process within 10-20 working days. Completion is dependant on postcode allocation by Royal Mail and PCC has no control on the timing of this part of the process.

Your reference number is {summary_ref}.

New development or request for change of address

58ca773b44b4b.Name: LLP011 List adddresses to select from
58ca773b44b4b.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name
FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{postcode_search_after},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))>5
AND postcode != ''
ORDER BY CAST(pao AS SIGNED),sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 300"}

58ca6c233f02c.Name: LLP015 Selected value to fields
58ca6c233f02c.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select
	sao as flat_out,
	pao as house_out,
	street_name as street_out,
	town_name as town_out, 
	postcode as postcode_out5,
	uprn as uprn_out,
	lng as lng_out,
	lat as lat_out,
	{Choose_Address} as uprn_selected
FROM 
	llpgcache
WHERE 
	uprn = {Choose_Address}"}

58ca9f8575eb5.Name: PRO010 Load Profile info to SFG Cust Details
58ca9f8575eb5.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select * From
(select
	1 as IDZZ,
	1 as existSelected,
	1 as existingCustomer,
	{Organisation_Name} as Organisation_Name_out,
	{Title} as Title_out,
	{First_Name} as First_Name_out,
	{Surname} as Surname_out,
	{flat} as flat_out,
	{house} as house_out,
	{street} as street_out,
	{town} as town_out, 
	if({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom','',{postcode}) as postcode_out5,
	if({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom',{postcode},'') as zIPPostcode,
	{country} as country_out,
	{country_id} as sel_country,
	{uprn} as uprn_out,
	{lng} as lng_out,
	{lat} as lat_out,
	{Date_of_Birth} as Date_of_Birth_out,
	{Email_Address} as Email_Address_out,
	{Mobile_Number} as Mobile_Number_out,
	{Phone_Number} as Phone_Number_out,
	'ProAi' as haveRun
union select
	2 as IDZZ,
	'' as existSelected,
	'' as existingCustomer,
	{Organisation_Name} as Organisation_Name_out,
	{Title} as Title_out,
	{First_Name} as First_Name_out,
	{Surname} as Surname_out,
	'' as flat_out,
	'' as house_out,
	'' as street_out,
	'' as town_out, 
	'' as postcode_out5,
	'' as zIPPostcode,
	'' as country_out,
	'' as sel_country,
	'' as uprn_out,
	'' as lng_out,
	'' as lat_out,
	{Date_of_Birth} as Date_of_Birth_out,
	{Email_Address} as Email_Address_out,
	{Mobile_Number} as Mobile_Number_out,
	{Phone_Number} as Phone_Number_out,
	'ProAe' as haveRun) Combine
Where
	IDZZ = (select if({subParm} like '%dA%' 
			and {subParm} not like '%oNA%'
			and {postcode} is not null ,1,2) as test)"}

58cac46f269a2.Name: LLP017 Change to Use Customer Recorded
58cac46f269a2.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {flat}, '') as flat_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {house}, '') as house_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {street}, '') as street_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {town}, '') as town_out, 
	IF(({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%')
		and ({country} IS NULL or {country} = '' or {country} = 'United Kingdom')), {postcode}, '') as postcode_out5,
	IF(({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%')
		and ({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom')), {postcode}, '') as zIPPostcode,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {country}, '') as country_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {uprn}, '') as uprn_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {lng}, '') as lng_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {lat}, '') as lat_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), 1, '') as existSelected,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), 1, '') as existingCustomer,
 'ProcAi' as haveRun"}

59dcd95a6ea67.Name: IT017 - Street naming and numbering - calculates cost

props.label: html 11
props.content:
PCC's Street Naming & Numbering service will use your contact details (email, phone number etc) to communicate with you for the purpose of street naming & numbering only. We will retain this information for the following periods.

  • Application for new street name, alterations to existing street name - 7 years after last action.
  • Application for property, alterations to existing property or corrections to existing property - 7 years after last action.
  • Official decision/notification document approving a new street name or approving a rename to an existing street - Permanent
  • Official decision/notification document approving a new property number or name and approving a renumber or rename to an existing property - Permanent

Please follow the link for more information. https://www.portsmouth.gov.uk/ext/the-council/data-protection-privacy-notice

props.label: html 5
props.content:
Portsmouth City Council provides a service to officially register all streets and properties in the City of Portsmouth. This is an important function as it enables the Council to maintain a comprehensive, unambiguous and accurate list of addresses. In turn, this enables:

  • Emergency services to find a property quickly
  • Residents to be registered correctly for electoral services
  • The Land Registry and Valuation Office to have the correct details for properties
  • Mail to be delivered efficiently
  • Visitors to find where they want to go
  • Services and products, such as broadband, to be delivered reliably

Applications for street names and house numbers should be made as soon as planning permission has been granted or when construction on site has commenced. Delays in applying for official registration of addresses may cause issues with utility companies etc.

Portsmouth City Council follows the national guidance and relevant British Standards (BS7666) when assigning address information and this can be found in the Street Naming & Numbering policy

Required information and documents

In order to complete the registration the following information will normally be required.

  • Planning reference number (if applicable) - please note we cannot normally apply for formal addressing until planning permission has been granted.
  • Proof of ownership or delegated responsibility for the development.
    • E.g land registry form, conveyance document or appropriate documentation to confirm that the applicant has the appropriate authorisation in place to undertake site development proposals and addressing/naming scheme.
    • (This is required to ensure that we do not receive incorrect instructions or register address changes and schemes inappropriately from unknown persons)
  • Site plan and floor plans (if appropriate) showing plot layout, location of main entrances and onto which road/highway the primary access is located.
  • For flats details of which floor the individual properties are on is important to the emergency services. This can be provided either by plans or a schedule
  • Whether the properties will have individual letter boxes or a communal single delivery point.
  • Estimated date of completion / occupation

Registration fees

New postal address for an individual property, annexe or change/addition of a house name £100
New development of 2-5 plots £200
New development of 6-20 plots £200 + £10 per property
New development of 21-100 plots £400 + £5 per property
New development of 101+ plots £950
Naming of new block of flats/building £200 + £10 per property
Change to new addresses due to the development changing after the notification certificate has been issued £15
Research archive for address history £100 (+VAT)
Renaming of an existing street £200 + £5 per property

All costs, including consultation, legal notices, highway signage and residents engagement are the responsibility of the applicant/developer.

Portsmouth City Council caps the registration fee for all developments at £950. When calculating the fee, especially where there is a mix of houses and flats, the fees will be reduced to ensure that it does not exceed £950, this may result in the final fee split being different to the fee structure shown above.
